subject: Soccer
Advertising and Marketing
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: World Cup sponsors showed predictable caution in responding to the Department of Justice’s indictment of nine FIFA officials on corruption charges, with Visa’s statement the most indignant.
snippet: World Cup sponsors showed predictable caution in responding to the Department of Justice’s indictment of nine FIFA officials on corruption charges, with Visa’s statement the most indignant.
